item.title: Set Container...
item.help:
This runs the statement:
alter session set container = "PDB_NAME"
in order to switch to the specified container.

prompt.label: To container:
prompt.default: select name from ( select name from ( select name from v$pdbs union all select 'CDB$ROOT' as name from dual ) order by case when name = 'CDB$ROOT' then 0 when name <> 'PDB$SEED' then 1 else 2 end asc, name ) where name <> sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_NAME') and rownum = 1
prompt.value: select name from ( select name from v$pdbs union all select 'CDB$ROOT' as name from dual ) order by case when name = 'CDB$ROOT' then 0 when name <> 'PDB$SEED' then 1 else 2 end asc, name

prompt.label: Using service:
prompt.value: select case when name is not null then 'service = "' || name || '"' end as service_clause from ( select name from v$services where pdb is null or pdb = :1 union ( select 'SYS$USERS' as name from dual union all select null from dual ) ) order by case when name = 'SYS$USERS' then 1 when name = 'SYS$BACKGROUND' then 2 else 0 end, name nulls first

confirmation.title: Alter session successful
confirmation.sql: select sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_NAME') as con_name, sys_context('USERENV', 'SERVICE_NAME') as service_name from dual
